commit.message:
Compute LLVM argument indices correctly in face of padding

Closes #47278

+// -C no-prepopulate-passes
+#![crate_type="staticlib"]
+
+#[repr(C)]
+pub struct Foo(u64);
+
+// CHECK: define {{.*}} @foo(
+#[no_mangle]
+pub extern fn foo(_: Foo) -> Foo { loop {} }
